name: Respond to Chat Tool
semantic_context: Send a message to a chat
natural_language_description: 这是 Respond to Chat Tool 节点。主要用于: Send a message to a chat

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.default: Send a message to a chat
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Send a message to a chat | (必填项)

generalNotice.displayName: Verify you're using a chat trigger with the 'Response Mode' option set to 'Using Response Nodes'
generalNotice.name: generalNotice
generalNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: Verify you're using a chat trigger with the 'Response Mode' option set to 'Using Response Nodes'

waitUserReply.name: waitUserReply
waitUserReply.natural_language_description: 参数名: Wait for User Reply | 默认值: True

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: limitWaitTime (值: None) - Whether to limit the time this node should wait for a user response before execution resumes
